price: Ka ce: "Na wãne ne abin da yake a cikin sammai da ƙasa?" Ka ce: "Na Allah ne." Yã wajabta rahama ga kanSa. Lalle ne Yanã tãra ku zuwa ga Rãnar ¡iyãma, babu shakka a gare Shi. Waɗanda suka yi hasãrar rãyukansu, to, sũ ba zã su yi ĩmani ba."
arabic: قُل لِّمَن مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ قُل لِّلَّهِۚ كَتَبَ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَةَۚ لَيَجۡمَعَنَّكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۚ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul liman mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi qul lillahi kataba ʿalā nafsihi al-raḥmata layajmaʿannakum ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati lā rayba fīhi alladhīna khasirū anfusahum fahum lā yu'minūna
